original_name: Time kyôshitsu: Tondera house no daibôken
plot: The adventures of an inventor whose time-travelling house enables him and his friends to encounter people/events from the Bible.

plot_es: The adventures of an inventor whose time-travelling house enables him and his friends to encounter people/events from the Bible.
title: Time kyôshitsu: Tondera house no daibôken
